channel.title: Comments on: Problems connecting to MySQL locally – try localhost instead of %
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Ryan Stille
item.dc:creator: Ryan Stille
item.description: You need to make sure you have a password set for YourUserName connecting from host &apos;cgi0603.int.bizland.net&apos;.   Maybe you should change your connection settings to specifically connect to &apos;localhost&apos;, if your database server is running locally.
item.content:encoded: You need to make sure you have a password set for YourUserName connecting from host 'cgi0603.int.bizland.net'.   Maybe you should change your connection settings to specifically connect to 'localhost', if your database server is running locally.
